name: poacher
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who catches and kills animals illegally: Poachers hunt and kill the rhinos for their horns. The rangers' main job is to deter poachers.

(also goal poacher) in football, a forward who scores a lot goals from a position close to the goal: George is a poacher in front of goal. Goal poacher Javier Hernandez scored a hat-trick on Saturday.
